summary: Broadway theatre is a special type of live performance in New York City. It happens in 41 big theaters with 500 or more seats, mostly in the Theater District near Times Square. Broadway is known for its musicals, which are very popular and have made New York City a cultural hub. These shows bring in lots of tourists and money, with ticket sales reaching over $1.5 billion each year. Even though not many theaters are on Broadway itself, the name is used for all these big performances.
title: Broadway theatre
